name: Assaulting Robots
description:
Assaulting Robots is an small, infinitely generating web game in which you must slaughter innocent little robots as you progress. The amount of robots that spawn will increase the further you go, and to kill them, you must simply bonk them on the head once - this is made easy with the "lock and slaughter" system. Health boosts will occasionally appear as you go, and you should probably try to avoid getting hit by robot bullets.

CONTROLS:

- SHIFT - Lock onto enemy either above or below you, you cannot jump while locked onto enemy

- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Kill an enemy above or below you

- A / D / SPACE - Left / Right / Jump

Music by @loomissss on Twitter
